Articles.Content: Hello! I've had KSP sense 0.16 but couldn't ever get a forum account working and well, here i am. However a question, why when i go to edit my profile (like my picture) It says i don't have premision. Please help!

Hi Poster, welcome to the community

You are currently a Curious George, and this is a simple any spam measure, a little while after your 5th post you will be upgraded to Bottle Rocketeer and can edit your profile.

So hang in there, you'll be fixed up soon enough
